verbose_text: PCR analysis of p21, which is an essential regulator of the quiescence of HSCs, also confirmed the FCM results, which showed that p21 expression in the HSCs from the 3D-Mix system was significantly higher than that in the cells from the 3D-OB system and very close to that in the cells from the 3D-MSC system, indicating that a large percentage of HSCs from the 3D-Mix system was maintained in the G0 stage of the cell cycle.
